name: Send a Telegram message for new Calendly invitees
description: Streamline your communication process by automatically sending personalized replies to new invitees in Calendly through Telegram. With this template, every time someone books an appointment via Calendly, Make will instantly send a tailored message to the invitee on Telegram, ensuring they feel welcomed and informed. This integration enhances your customer engagement and saves you time, allowing you to focus on what matters mostâ€”your appointments.
